wikipedia_page.main: Garbhan Downey (born 24 February 1966) is a novelist and editor from Derry, Northern Ireland. He is the former Director of Communications and Marketing for Culture Company 2013, which delivered Derry's City of Culture year.

link_mentions.page: List of writers from Northern Ireland

response: *Extracts from - 'Creggan: more than a history' by Michael McGuinness and Garbhan Downey (2000). .
*'Off Broadway' by Garbhan Downey (Guildhall Press, 2005). A series of humorous short stories set in post-ceasefire Creggan.
